scripts.install:dev: bun install && bun --cwd=packages/coding-agent link && bun --cwd=packages/ai link
scripts.test: bun --cwd=packages/ai run test && bun --cwd=packages/agent run test && bun --cwd=packages/tui run test && bun --cwd=packages/natives run test && bun --cwd=packages/coding-agent run test
scripts.check: bun run check:ts && bun run check:rs
scripts.check:ts: biome check . && tsgo -p tsconfig.json && tsgo -p packages/stats/tsconfig.client.json
scripts.check:rs: cargo fmt --all -- --check && cargo clippy --workspace -- -D warnings && cargo check -Z minimal-versions --workspace
scripts.lint: bun run lint:ts && bun run lint:rs
scripts.fmt: bun run fmt:ts && bun run fmt:rs
scripts.fix: bun run fix:ts && bun run fix:rs
scripts.fix:ts: biome check --write --unsafe . && bun --cwd=packages/coding-agent run format-prompts && bun --cwd=packages/coding-agent run generate-docs-index
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -ws --no-git-tag-version && bun scripts/sync-versions.ts && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules bun.lock && bun install
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -ws --no-git-tag-version && bun scripts/sync-versions.ts && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules bun.lock && bun install
scripts.version:major: npm version major -ws --no-git-tag-version && bun scripts/sync-versions.ts && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules bun.lock && bun install
scripts.publish: bun run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public
scripts.publish:dry: bun run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public --dry-run
scripts.clean: rm -rf target dist node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist
